headline: How ICE’s Treasury Clearing Approval and Capital Returns At Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. recently reported higher fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 revenues and earnings, announced an 8% increase in its quarterly dividend to US$0.52 per share for first quarter 2026, completed a US$1.93 billion buyback program, and authorized a new share repurchase plan of up to US$3.00 billion. The SEC’s approval of ICE Clear Credit to clear U.S. Treasury securities and the launch of the Reddit Signals and Sentiment analytics suite highlight how ICE is expanding...
